statements: DELETE FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE item_id = 101 AND supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 OR last_ordered_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM supply_orders WHERE order_id = 200 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies';
DELETE FROM smart_kitchen_appliances WHERE appliance_id = 101 AND appliance_type = 'Refrigerator';
DELETE FROM supply_orders WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' AND order_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id IN (2, 3)
DELETE FROM orders WHERE status = 'cancelled' AND total_cost < 1000
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 5 AND unit_price > 50
